original_title: Help Me Have No Human Ways
overview: HELP ME HAVE NO HUMAN WAYS is a short experimental sci-fi film briefly visiting Ti and Do's Next Level teachings. With writing-consultation & soundtrack provided by ex-Heaven's Gate Cult member Sawyer, you can expect something thought-provoking and quite literally "out of this world." Narrated by Italian cinema veterans Franco Garofalo (Hell of the Living Dead, The Other Hell) and Daniela Giordano (Miss Italia 1966!!!)
title: Help Me Have No Human Ways
